title: The Elon Musk / DOGE Debacle (2025)
description:
# The Elon Musk / DOGE Debacle (2025)

Trump handed unprecedented government access to the world's richest man, who held **$300+ billion in federal contracts** while leading efforts to slash government spending. **Ethics expert Richard Painter:** "If he participates in any United States government matter that has a direct and predictable effect on his financial holdings, he commits a crime." Musk later admitted DOGE was only **"somewhat successful"** and said he regretted doing it: **"Instead of doing DOGE, I would have, basically, worked on my companies."**

## The Nazi Salute Controversy (January 20, 2025)

- At Trump inauguration rally, placed hand on heart then **extended arm outward with palm down** - twice
- Said: "My heart goes out to you. It is thanks to you that the future of civilization is assured"
- Widely condemned in Germany where such gestures are illegal
- Neo-Nazi and white supremacist groups celebrated it as Nazi salute
- **Rep. Jerry Nadler:** "I never imagined we would see the day when what appears to be a Heil Hitler salute would be made behind the Presidential seal"
- Musk dismissed as "dirty tricks," then posted Nazi-themed puns and jokes on X
- Steve Bannon replicated salute at CPAC to applause
- Multiple European political parties demanded Musk be banned from their countries
- Holocaust memorial Yad Vashem chair Danny Dayan condemned Musk's comments that there is **"too much focus on past guilt"**

## Massive Conflicts of Interest

- Six companies with **$300B+ in federal contracts** (SpaceX, Tesla, Starlink, Neuralink, xAI, Boring Company)
- Given **"full and prompt access to all unclassified agency records, software systems, and IT systems"**
- **Ethics expert Kathleen Clark:** Trump handed Musk "the keys to the candy store" including "sensitive procurement data"
- White House exempted Musk from filing public financial disclosure
- Trump said Musk would **"identify his own conflicts"** - itself a conflict of interest
- Tesla won **742 new H-1B visas** in 2024 (doubled from 2023), plus 1,025 extensions
- NLRB investigating SpaceX and Tesla - while DOGE tried to cancel NLRB Buffalo office lease
- SEC suing Musk for securities violations - while DOGE reviewed SEC
- Democrats documented **"100 conflicts of interest" in first 100 days**
- Rep. Sherrill called for Inspector General investigations at eight federal agencies

## DOGE Operations & Failures

- Gained access to Treasury payment systems (processes trillions of dollars)
- Accessed classified information at USAID
- **317,000 federal employees departed in 2025**
- Mass firings challenged in court; federal judges ordered reinstatements
- Promised trillions in savings; delivered only **~$200 billion in identified savings**
- Vivek Ramaswamy departed DOGE within weeks to run for Ohio Governor
- **DOGE officially shuttered by late 2025**
- Musk later admitted: **"We were a little bit successful. We were somewhat successful"**
- Musk: **"I don't think so"** when asked if he'd do it again
- Musk acknowledged Tesla and SpaceX suffered because of DOGE work

## H-1B Visa MAGA Civil War (December 2024)

- Triggered when Trump appointed Indian-born Sriram Krishnan as AI adviser
- Laura Loomer attacked appointment, made racist comments about Indian immigrants
- Loomer: **"United States was built by white Europeans, not third-world invaders"**
- Musk: **"I will go to war on this issue the likes of which you cannot possibly comprehend"**
- Musk: **"Take a big step back and FUCK YOURSELF in the face"**
- Steve Bannon called Musk a **"toddler"** trying to establish **"techno-feudalism on a global scale"**
- Bannon: "We want reparations for the tech workers that you stole their lives"
- Loomer called Musk **"welfare queen":** "You bought your way into MAGA 5 minutes ago after Trump almost had his head blown off in Butler"
- Critics (Loomer, Gavin Mario Wax, Owen Shroyer, ConservativePAC) had **X verification badges removed** after criticizing H-1B

## Tesla Takedown Protests (February-March 2025)

- **"Tesla Takedown"** organized by actor Alex Winter and Prof. Joan Donovan: "Sell your Teslas, dump your stock, join the picket lines"
- 200+ demonstrations at Tesla locations in US, Canada, Europe
- Signs: "No one elected Musk," "Drive Tesla out of Biz," "Dogs against Doge"
- **Tesla shares dropped 50%+ from December peak**
- **Q1 2025: Sales plunged 13%** - largest quarterly drop in Tesla history (336,681 cars, 50,000 fewer than Q1 2024)
- Violent incidents: Boston (7 charging stations set on fire), Las Vegas (5 cars firebombed), Colorado, South Carolina, Oregon (Molotov cocktails)
- Trump declared anti-Musk Tesla attacks would be treated as **"domestic terrorism"**
- AG Pam Bondi: "If you're going to touch a Tesla, go to a dealership, do anything, you better watch out because we're coming after you"
- Musk wistfully admitted: **"They wouldn't have been burning the cars"** if he hadn't joined DOGE
